definitions: a fungus that produces a spherical or pear-shaped fruiting body which ruptures when ripe to release a cloud of spores.

notes.text: Families Lycoperdaceae, class Gasteromycetes, in particular genus Lycoperdon. See also giant puffball

shortDefinitions: fungus that produces spherical or pear-shaped fruiting body which ruptures when ripe to release cloud of spores

definitions: the spherical head of a dandelion that has gone to seed.
shortDefinitions: spherical head of dandelion that has gone to seed
